K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42a-1: a'arya sv'alp'a aaksha ra pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42a-9: po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42b-4: khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42b-5: bltas te / dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs so //
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42b-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42b-8: te / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42b-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42b-15: tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:42b-23: bshad du gsol / ba byin te / rigs kyi bu /
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-0: khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la @43a *//
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-1: phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so //
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-4: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du la bsod nams che ba /
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-6: gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang /

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-9: bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-10: la bshad do // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-11: sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-13: la bshad do // to // sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol /
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-15: thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-16: la snyoms par zhugs so; ;mnyam par bzhag pa des

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43a-19: 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to //

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-0: cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @43b

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab bo //
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa /

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-9: sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o //
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o //
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-12: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-14: aom mu ne mu ne mah'a mu na ye sv'ah'a /

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-16: rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo //
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa chen po las /
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-20: khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas de'i phyir byang chub
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:43b-21: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-1: khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang /
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-4: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang /
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-5: glegs ba ma du bris nas mchod pa byed pa
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-6: de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-11: aa ba me sa ra sa ra ni /
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-14: de ba ta aa nu p'a la ne; bud dhota
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-15: t'a ra ni p'u ra ya p'u ra ya bha
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-16: ga ba ti / sarb'a sha ma sha ma pa
K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-17: ri p'u ra ya sa pa ri wa ra sya

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-20: ga ba ti / sarba satva n'anytsa / dha ya / buddha aa dhishtha ne na sv'ah'a /

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-27: bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so //

K12D0530=D0022_H0498=H0024:44a-29: gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro //
